showerReviews.reviewText: This was a nice place to stop for gas, restrooms, and food while driving on I-90. There was a good selection of food and drink. The bathrooms were clean.

Always our dependable half way point stop. Wide variety of snacks , food and drinks. Clean bathrooms. Highly desirable stop as sometimes a line will form while trying to check out. Keep in mind this may be the last decent gas station if you're heading towards county H.
Clean, felt safe, friendly.
Store was clean and well organized.  Employee was friendly and helpful.

I stayed at this Petro a few years back and after reading the reviews, nothing has changed or improved. Although this Petro is much closer to my delivery, I'll be staying at the Loves just south of you. It's cleaner, safer, and has the ‚Ä¶

This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

showerReviews.reviewText: Honestly after seeing some negative comments on the showers, we were hesitant to stop at this location. Thankfully, we had a great experience! While the truck parking was completely full, we did get to snag a temporary parking area to come ‚Ä¶

I was here 2 times in 3 weeks...

NO HOT WATER IN SHOWERS ‚Ä¶

04-09-25
The store is in the process of renovating. New showers. Unfortunately, the cheap shower heads spoil so much efforts of renovating them. ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a Love‚Äôs. Parking here can fill quickly. I usually park across the road at the road ranger and walk over to Love‚Äôs to use my free showers. There‚Äôs a sidewalk that connects the truck stops. It gets me a bit of exercise to walk briskly before the ten-minute clock on the shower expires.

It's time for another cup of coffee and to get rid of the previous cup of coffee. The restrooms were clean and welcoming. The convenience store was well stocked (Hot dogs at 8am? I guess.) and the lady who rang up my sale was polite and ‚Ä¶
They have the cleanest showers out of all truck stops! The overall facilities is very clean and hygienic. I stop here for the coffee all the time and the staff is always so friendly.

showerReviews.reviewText: Bad place, so we stopped on aug 24th. They had no showers for that day because they only had 1 person at counter and nobody available to clean showers. Besides the Manager. So I go to get a shower next morning and cannot because my shower ‚Ä¶

At 9:13PM 7/29, the shower app wouldn't work. An employee at the register told me it was because none of the showers were clean and none would be ready until 10:00PM. I was so looking forward to a shower. Going to bed dirty.
A really good place to layover until your next drive shift. This TA don't proclaim to be the best, but they do make you feel right at home with food and a hot shower. It's a truck stop!

I'd give this one 0 stars if that was an option.  But we'll go with one!  Parking was ok, shower attendant was super nice.  That's where the decent stuff ends though.  No restaurant,  S*#t and toilet paper all over the floors & toilets both ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶
